channel.title: World Value Survey on Political Science Research Methods
channel.description: Recent content in World Value Survey on Political Science Research Methods

item.title: Supplemental Info on Datasets for Research Exercise
item.description: Table of Contents American National Election Studies (ANES) 2016 World Value Survey (WVS) Wave 6 Democracy Cross-national Data (Pippa Norris) American National Election Studies (ANES) 2016 Useful tool to explore variables in ANES dataset based on categories SDA utility from UC Berkeley I recommend this as tool to explore which variables are available, and which ones are measuring similar concepts. This is useful when you are not very familiar with the ANES data, and not sure exactly what data are available.
